mapper.select: select ID,MBR_ID,WEIGHT,HEIGHT,BMI,CREATE_TIME from APP_PREPARATION_WEIGHT_RECORD where ID = #{ id}
mapper.insert: insert into APP_PREPARATION_WEIGHT_RECORD (ID,MBR_ID,WEIGHT,HEIGHT,BMI,CREATE_TIME) values ( #{ id, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ mbrId, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ weight, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ height, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ bmi, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ createTime, javaType=Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update APP_PREPARATION_WEIGHT_RECORD set MBR_ID = #{ mbrId, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{ weight, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEIGHT = #{ height, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BMI = #{ bmi, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{ createTime, javaType=Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{ id}
